name: ChaseFuture International Limited
description: Provider of an educational consulting platform designed to provide mentorship for talented and determined individuals. The company's educational consulting platform offers assistance and consulting services to international students during their university admission processes and helps them to take their decision wisely, enabling users to get motivated and develop the skills and network needed to launch an international career.
